text:
Sir Charles Moses
August 17, 1967
Page 2
My ’’charming lady” and I would dearly love to get to the Singapore meeting in
October, because our oldest daughter is now married and living in Thailand,
and we would relish the excuse to go visit her.
I am truly sorry to be so long in responding to your letter and your gracious
efforts in our behalf.
Most sincerely,
WQH5 Ira
William G. Harley
